game.name: Dotted Girl Fashion Blog
game.description:
Your fashion dotted girl runs its own fashion blog through which she earns enough money to survive. Today she has again a plan to prepare a blog that covers the unique and trendy look of a mannequin. But, for this purpose, she needs your help. Would you like to come forward and guide her to create a jaw-dropping dress on a mannequin? Join Dotted Girl Fashion Blog and be prepared to dress up a mannequin with the cool summer outfits and capture an image of it!

Start the fun girl game by choosing a lovely blue top with a heart image in the middle and pair it with an orange skirt with star prints and a purple strip on the waist! Make sure to complete her look with a blue handbag with Love print and an orange sneaker. You can also opt for a cute pink top and combine it with a wrapped green skirt along with a pair of pink and yellow sandals with multiple straps and a white handbag with yellow stripes in this HTML5 dressing game. 

There are various other options to select from while looking for a new fashionable look for the mannequin. Take a picture of the final look and post it on the blog in this fashion challenge! Promote her blog and help her to gather money for her hard work! Do not need to feel embarrass if you fail in the first attempt since you have multiple attempts to do to create the awesome results. Play more dress-up mobile games and have fun with your friends without download!
